Header: Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme continues in Gampaha
Content: Today is the fifth day of the Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme. It is being held centering the Gampaha District. Many programmes are being held covering 13 Divisional Secretariat Divisions within the Gampaha District. 11,354 projects had been implemented in the Gampaha District during last year. These programmes are being further made efficient under the Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme. Gampaha District Secretary Sunil Jayalath said that the expenditure incurred by the Government on this programme is over 15,000 million rupees. The Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme is being implemented further expanding the Grama Shakthi and other development projects under the guidance of the Presidential Secretariat. The Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu programme is operative until the 05th of this month.
